name: yarnify-online-ordering-system
description: Yarnify is an Online Ordering System where user can Order Crochet and Knitting Tools and Supplies

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n Frontend,Auth,Product,Payment -c cyan,red,green,blue "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd services/auth-service && npm run dev" "cd services/product-service && npm run dev" "cd services/payment-service && npm run dev"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n Frontend,Auth,Product,Payment -c cyan,red,green,blue "serve -s frontend/dist" "cd services/auth-service && npm start" "cd services/product-service && npm start" "cd services/payment-service && npm start"
